  • Constructor Details

    • PlaneStub

      public PlaneStub()
      Repository stub instantiation

  • Method Details

    • boardThePlane

      public void boardThePlane()
      Operation board the plane. It is called by a Passenger after his documents have been checked by the hostess.

    • waitForEndOfFlight

      public void waitForEndOfFlight()
      Operation wait for end of flight. It is called by a Passenger, blocking until it is waken up by the pilot when the flight reaches the destination airport.

    • leaveThePlane

      public void leaveThePlane()
      Operation leave the plane. It is called by a Passenger.

    • informPlaneReadyToTakeOff

      public void informPlaneReadyToTakeOff​(int n_passengers)
      Operation inform plane ready to takeoff. It is called by the Hostess. This operation waits until all passengers of a certain flight have boarded the plane. As soon as that happens, wakes up the pilot, allowing him to take off.
      Parameters:
      n_passengers - number of passengers waiting for boarding

    • waitForAllInBoard

      public void waitForAllInBoard()
      Operation wait for all in board. It is called by the Pilot. This operation waits until the hostess informs him that all passengers have boarded the plane.

    • announceArrival

      public void announceArrival()
      Operation announce arrival. It is called by Pilot. Notifies the passengers that the flight has reached the destination airport and waits until all passengers left the plane.
